title: Missed ISA2 Review 3rd sem
content: is there a way if i can do review, like last time they gave a Google form to fill out for all those who missed it, these people really messed up by giving 'all' cse people just 1hr for review

comments.body: Highly doubtful they would do that again

Bro my friends and I went in with ECE/AIML students at like 3:20 itself, there was no crowd at the time. You could have gone and finished it off quickly because by the time I came out there was a crowd the size of China on the corridor.
hmm my fault didn't know, I thought the management would organize for a smooth flow, they could have peacefully kept it on Thursday :(
Next time try go a bit earlier than the allotted slot lol. There are 700 people, it's bound to get crowded.

>management would organize for a smooth flow

Tch tch tch, amateur mistake.

Also next time, remember that they only divide you into slots to distribute you over time slots. You can go for review at any time on the same day.

last sem we werent allowed to do that. we had our physics esa that day. everyone crowded around the room for isa review right after the exam ended, the teachers shooed us away like stray dogs lmao. I had to stay 4 hours in campus after the exam ended just to wait for my section's turn.
